original_text: Then the priest shall examine him, and if the diseased swelling is reddish-white on his bald head or on his bald forehead, like the appearance of leprous disease in the skin of the body,
korean_text: 제사장은 그를 진찰할지니 그 대머리에나 이마 대머리에 돋은 색점이 희고 불그스름하여 피부에 발생한 나병과 같으면

sentences.original_text: Then the priest shall examine him,
and if the diseased swelling is reddish-white
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그 문둥병 부위가 붉은빛을 띤 흰색이면

sentences.original_text: like the appearance of leprous disease
in the skin of the body,
